title: Samantha Ruth Prabhu is ‘not crying’ watching Allu Arjun's emotional reunion with wife Sneha Reddy and kids - Hindustan Times
summary:
Samantha Ruth Prabhu is ‘not crying’ watching Allu Arjun's emotional reunion with wife Sneha Reddy and kids

Published on: Dec 14, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Allu Arjun had an emotional reunion with his family after being released from jail on interim bail, following his arrest in connection to a tragedy at the premiere of his film, Pushpa 2: The Rule.

  • Allu Arjun was arrested due to a fan's death during a chaotic premiere event.
  • He returned home on Saturday morning to hugs from his family, including his wife and children.
  • Samantha Ruth Prabhu reacted to the moment on her Instagram, stating, "I am not crying, okay!"
  • Vignesh Shivan expressed condolences and praised Arjun’s maturity in handling the situation.
  • Other celebrities, including Varun Dhawan and Rashmika Mandanna, showed support for Arjun during this difficult time.
“Waited to only see this! Very very unfortunate to go through this @alluarjunonline sir, but the way he handled this was very mature and dignified.” - Vignesh Shivan

This incident has drawn significant attention from both fans and the media, highlighting the pressures faced by celebrities in the public eye.

title: Pushpa 2 (Hindi) Day 10 Box Office Trends: Allu Arjun starrer scores biggest second Saturday in history of Hindi Cinema - PINKVILLA
summary:
Pushpa 2 (Hindi) Day 10 Box Office Trends: Allu Arjun starrer scores biggest second Saturday in history of Hindi Cinema

Published on: Dec 14, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

The Allu Arjun-led Pushpa 2 has achieved a remarkable milestone, setting a record for the highest second Saturday box office collection in the history of Hindi Cinema.

  • The film is expected to earn Rs 41 to Rs 43 crore on its 10th day, raising the total to Rs 458 crore.
  • It surpasses the previous record held by Stree 2, which collected Rs 33 crore on its second Saturday.
  • Pushpa 2’s second weekend collection is projected to reach Rs 115 crore, the highest ever.
  • Allu Arjun is on track to join the Rs 500 crore club by the second Sunday.
  • The film is likely to become the third biggest Hindi feature film in 13 days, surpassing numerous blockbusters.
“Pushpa 2 has established Allu Arjun as one of the most popular faces in the Hindi markets.”

In conclusion, Pushpa 2's unprecedented box office success positions it as a formidable contender in Indian cinema, with Allu Arjun possibly becoming a leading crowd-puller in the Hindi film industry.

title: Anurag Kashyap says 'ye bhi gayi' as he shares pics from daughter Aaliyah Kashyap's wedding with Shane Gregoire - Hindustan Times
summary:
Anurag Kashyap says 'ye bhi gayi' as he shares pics from daughter Aaliyah Kashyap's wedding with Shane Gregoire

Date: Dec 14, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Filmmaker Anurag Kashyap shared a series of photos from his daughter Aaliyah Kashyap's wedding to Shane Gregoire, highlighting moments spent with family during the special occasion.

  • Anurag Kashyap shared wedding photos on Instagram featuring Aaliyah and Shane.
  • The wedding included rituals performed by Anurag and his ex-wife Aarti Bajaj.
  • Prominent guests at the reception included celebrities like Shah Rukh Khan's daughter Suhana and actors Nawazuddin Siddiqui and Abhishek Bachchan.
  • Aaliyah and Shane got engaged in a private ceremony last year and announced their engagement on Instagram in May 2023.
"Ye bhi gayi (This one is also gone) .. @shanegregoire my Silly take care of her. And I will get back to my stubborn self."

Aaliyah and Shane's wedding marked a significant moment for Anurag, who expressed his emotions about the day's importance and shared a heartfelt message on social media. The event celebrated love and family, drawing attention from fans and followers alike.

title: Naga Chaitanya, Rana Daggubati, Vijay Deverakonda meet Pushpa 2 star Allu Arjun after his release from jail. Watch videos - The Indian Express
summary:

title: Ranbir-Alia channel Raj Kapoor-core, Saif-Kareena bring Nawabi flair to greatest showman's centenary celebrations - Hindustan Times
summary:
Ranbir-Alia channel Raj Kapoor-core, Saif-Kareena bring Nawabi flair to greatest showman's centenary celebrations

Date: Dec 14, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

The celebrations marking the centenary of Raj Kapoor brought together prominent members of the Kapoor family, showcasing stunning fashion and honoring the legacy of Indian cinema's greatest showman.

  • Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt opened the event at the Prime Minister's residence, inviting guests to a celebration in Mumbai.
  • Ranbir donned a midnight velveteen bandhgala, resembling Raj Kapoor, while Alia wore a vintage-inspired Sabyasachi saree.
  • Kareena Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan showcased their Nawabi heritage with elegant traditional attire.
  • Vicky Kaushal also captured attention with a sharp pinstriped suit, adding to the evening's fashion highlight.
  • Fashion trends of the night leaned heavily on retro styles, celebrating the iconic era of the 60s.
"Alia looked sophisticated-ly sultry while Saif and Kareena looked every bit the Nawab and Begum."

The night was a grand salute to the legacy of Raj Kapoor, as stars paid tribute through their attire, embodying the essence and glamour of Indian cinema’s rich history.

title: Pushpa 2 Box Office Collections: Allu Arjun starrer holds well on second Friday, rises to 850cr in India - PINKVILLA
summary:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collections: Allu Arjun starrer holds well on second Friday, rises to 850cr in India

Publication Date: Dec 14, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

Pushpa 2 has achieved impressive box office success, grossing a total of Rs. 853 crore in India, approaching the Rs. 1000 crore milestone.

  • On its second Friday, Pushpa 2 earned approximately Rs. 42.50 crore.
  • The film experienced minimal collection drops and even some growth in Telugu states from Thursday.
  • Pushpa 2’s second Friday gross is the second highest of all time, trailing only Baahubali 2.
  • The film has already surpassed Rs. 1000 crore worldwide as of Wednesday.
  • Territorial box office breakdown shows AP/TS leading with Rs. 234.50 crore, followed by the Hindi Belt at Rs. 485 crore.

“It was essential for it to hold well on the second Friday to hope for a strong second-week hold, and the film has done better than it probably needed to.”

Pushpa 2 is on course to challenge the box office record held by Baahubali 2 as it continues its successful run in theaters.

Suriya and Trisha’s characters in Suriya45 revealed - 123telugu
summary:
Suriya and Trisha’s characters in Suriya45 revealed

Published on: Dec 14, 2024 11:07 am IST

The makers of Suriya45 have announced that Trisha will play the female lead alongside Suriya, marking their first collaboration in 19 years. Both actors will portray lawyers in this upcoming rural entertainer directed by RJ Balaji.

  • Trisha returns to share screen space with Suriya after nearly two decades.
  • Suriya and Trisha will both be portraying lawyer characters in the film.
  • This marks Suriya's third portrayal of a lawyer in his last four films.
  • The film is produced by SR Prakash Babu and SR Prabhu under Dream Warrior Pictures.
  • Sai Abhyankar is the music composer for Suriya45.
“Suriya is donning the lawyer’s role for the third time in his last four movies.”

Suriya45 is generating excitement among fans as it promises to be a captivating rural entertainer. Further updates are anticipated as the film progresses toward its release.

title: Raj Kapoor birth centenary: Rekha blesses Amitabh Bachchan’s grandson Agastya, Saif Ali Khan admires Tiger Shroff’s biceps. Watch videos - The Indian Express
summary:
Raj Kapoor birth centenary: Rekha blesses Amitabh Bachchan’s grandson Agastya, Saif Ali Khan admires Tiger Shroff’s biceps. Watch videos

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: The Indian Express

The Kapoor family celebrated the legendary Raj Kapoor’s 100th birth anniversary with a grand event in Mumbai, sharing heartwarming moments on social media.

  • The celebration included notable figures like Rekha, who blessed Agastya Nanda.
  • Saif Ali Khan admired Tiger Shroff’s biceps during the event.
  • Alia Bhatt directed guests to the screening of Raj Kapoor’s film "Awaara".

  • This centenary celebration features screenings of 10 iconic Raj Kapoor films across 40 cities.
“Which film is starting? Awaara! Who wants to go see Awaara? Please go.” - Alia Bhatt

The centenary celebrations are a tribute to Raj Kapoor's legacy, showcasing the joy and connections among the next generation of stars.

title: Raj Kapoor: Celebrating 100 years of the 'greatest showman of Indian cinema' - BBC.com
summary:
Raj Kapoor: Celebrating 100 years of the 'greatest showman of Indian cinema'

Publication Date: Not specified Source: BBC News

Raj Kapoor, fondly called the "greatest showman of Indian cinema", was a pioneering filmmaker, producer, and actor whose work continues to influence Indian films. Celebrations are taking place across the country to honor what would have been his 100th birthday.

  • Raj Kapoor remains a beloved figure in Indian cinema nearly four decades after his death in 1988.
  • His early films often had a socialistic theme, reflecting the country's aspirations post-independence.
  • A retrospective of 10 of his iconic films will be showcased in 40 cities and 135 cinemas across India.
  • Kapoor's notable films include Aag, Barsaat, Awara, Shree 420, and others, establishing RK Films as a major studio.
"Kapoor brought romance, sexuality, song and soul to Indian socialism." - Sunil Khilnani, historian

Raj Kapoor's legacy is celebrated as he profoundly influenced Indian cinema through his artistic vision and storytelling, impacting generations of filmmakers and audiences alike.

title: A Closer Look At Keerthy Suresh’s Wedding Sarees - NDTV Swirlster
Can use M.S. Subbulakshmi’s name for cash prize to be given to T.M. Krishna: Madras High Court - The Hindu
summary:
Can use M.S. Subbulakshmi’s name for cash prize to be given to T.M. Krishna: Madras High Court

Publication Date: December 13, 2024 Source: The Hindu

The Madras High Court has overturned a previous injunction, allowing the Music Academy to award a cash prize named after M.S. Subbulakshmi to T.M. Krishna. This decision supports the ongoing tradition of honoring Subbulakshmi's achievements through awards.

  • The Division Bench set aside an interim injunction that barred the use of M.S. Subbulakshmi’s name for the ‘Sangita Kalanidhi Award’ cash prize.
  • The award has been given since 2005 by the Music Academy to select awardees.
  • The court noted that conferring awards in memory of a legend is lawful and not prohibited.
  • The plaintiff's argument, stemming from a will that purportedly restricts such naming, was rejected by the court as unfounded.
  • The judges pointed out that numerous awards and institutions already honor Subbulakshmi’s name without legal challenge from the plaintiff.
“Every award in the name of M.S. Subbulakshmi was only to remember the great icon of Carnatic music. A case of this nature will be shocking to several lakhs of singers and musicians.”

The court allowed for further legal proceedings to take their course, but emphasized that the interim injunction was not warranted. This decision reinforces the legacy of M.S. Subbulakshmi in the world of Carnatic music while paving the way for T.M. Krishna to receive the award as scheduled.
